name: We have Nothing! (Ludum Dare 45)
description:
We have Nothing!

>>>>> if game is not responding, click on the game canvas <<<<<

Our first LD (theme: Start with nothing) entry ever! We've had a blast making this. We had around 36 hours to make this, so we have to submit a bit early. With not much of game-dev experience and close to zero artistic skills, we are happy with the results. It was great experience and we are already looking forward to next LDJ. 

CONTROLS:
Typing - keyboard
Movement - 'W' , 'A', 'D'
Movement of Platforms - Arrow keys
Restart of level - 'R' (Only available in game later on)

TEAM:

Vojtěch Řeřábek (programator)

Miroslav Moš (programator)
